attributes.action: Pay restructure for Civil and Public Servants
attributes.additional_details:
We ask HM Government to look at all employment contracts, paid by the state to all Civil and Public Servants over the pay award of the Prime Minister £142,500 and restructure the pay awards equivalant to an MP, Cabinet Minister, Committee Member, Speaker and the Prime Minister.

http://www.thebureauinvestigates.com/2010/09/20/public-sector-rich-list-9000-earn-more-than-the-prime-minister-2/ used as examples.
